Initializer# init(portaitEffectsMatte:options:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init?(
    portaitEffectsMatte matte: AVPortraitEffectsMatte,
    options: [CIImageOption : Any]? = nil
)
```
